programme.title: Offroad & Fun, Part 25
programme.desc: Experience the blazing speed and heart-stopping stunts of Rally and Motocross.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: Jaguar company founder Sir William Lyons built his first automobile in 1931. Only a few years later, the Jaguar SS 100 appeared, a sports car that was superior to all others. Since then, every Jaguar has fascinated with its power, dynamics and elegance.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: From the very beginning, Jaguar's sports and racing cars have been tailor-made for top speeds. Whether Le Mans, Daytona or the Monte Carlo Rally, Jaguar dominated and shaped international motorsport for many years.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: The history of Volkswagen begins in 1936 with the Beetle. The iconic small car becomes a propaganda object, a million-seller and a film star. But Volkswagen was almost too late in building a modern successor, and the company went into crisis. Part 1 of 2.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: At the beginning of the 1970s, Volkswagen is in crisis. The company has no answer to the oil crisis and no successor to the Beetle. It was only with the new generation Passat and Golf cars that Volkswagen returned to the fast lane. Part 2 of 2.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: Whether with their rocket vehicles or their Ascona or Calibra car models, racing has been closely associated with the Opel brand for over 100 years. Just two years after the start of car production, the first Opel won a race in 1901.

programme.title: Historic Formula V
programme.desc: In the late fifties in America, the first Formula V racers were produced. The goal: Affordable motor sport for everyone. The small, open wheel cars were seen on the race tracks until the end of the 70s. Then the series was stopped. About 20 years ago a couple of Formula V owners came together and established the "Historic Formula V Europe" as an association.

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.desc: The Nürburgring is the place where you can really let your hair down on a spectacular and difficult race track and learn how to get fit for motor sports. This is the reason why motoring enthusiasts go there throughout the year.

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.desc: We prepared some very entertaining clips from the Nürburgring for you. Expect to see the pedal on the metal and rubber burning.

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.desc: When the weather cleared up a bit at the Nürburgring, we were finally back at the track. As soon as the snow and ice were gone the horsepower junkies returned to the ring to once again let their engines roar.

programme.title: Artega GT
programme.desc: From 2006 to 2012 the German company Artega produced their GT sports car model. Thanks to the know-how of a former Porsche and BMW manager the Artega GT was able to be manufactured in a small series.

programme.title: Ferrari California T
programme.desc: The Ferrari California T has a lot of Italian passion and elegant lines to offer. Super sports car cabriolets are popular all over the world. It is no wonder that more and more manufacturers are 'opening up'.

programme.title: Chevrolet Caprice 9C1 police car
programme.desc: This 1994 Chevrolet Caprice 9C1 is a former police car from the Los Angeles Police Department. Its curvaceous body was often mocked as looking like a whale, but this Chevy Caprice possesses the qualities of a shark.

programme.title: Biker Lifestyle
programme.desc: Lake Faaker is both a popular holiday spot in Austria and also a place with a special tradition. In early September, the region is the destination for thousands of bikers who celebrate their big annual event, the European Bike Week. (Part 1 of 5)

programme.title: Biker Lifestyle
programme.desc: Lake Faaker is both a popular holiday spot in Austria and also a place with a special tradition. In early September, the region is the destination for thousands of bikers who celebrate their big annual event, the European Bike Week. (Part 2 of 5)

programme.title: Biker Lifestyle
programme.desc: Lake Faaker is both a popular holiday spot in Austria and also a place with a special tradition. In early September, the region is the destination for thousands of bikers who celebrate their big annual event, the European Bike Week. (Part 3 of 5)

programme.title: Biker Lifestyle
programme.desc: Lake Faaker is both a popular holiday spot in Austria and also a place with a special tradition. In early September, the region is the destination for thousands of bikers who celebrate their big annual event, the European Bike Week. (Part 4 of 5)

programme.title: Biker Lifestyle
programme.desc: Lake Faaker is both a popular holiday spot in Austria and also a place with a special tradition. In early September, the region is the destination for thousands of bikers who celebrate their big annual event, the European Bike Week. (Part 5 of 5)

programme.title: Harley-Davidson Trio
programme.desc: We took a look at three very different Harley-Davidson models. The versatile Switchback Dyna, the motorized wheelie bike Sportster 72, and the bad-boy motorcycle Softail Slim.

programme.title: KTM 990 Adventure
programme.desc: It's very big and mostly comes in orange: the KTM 990 Adventure. Over rough terrain it's often driven standing up. Today, the 990 is considered the off-road specialist among travel Enduros.

programme.title: Facel Vega Facellia
programme.desc: In the late 1950s, the Facel Vega Facellia was designed to compete with Porsche and Alfa Romeo and open a new market segment for the fledgling French luxury car company.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: We test drove the Rallye Defender and examined how a Jeep Wrangler with only few modifications can double in price. Also: how does the Fiat Panda 4x4 fare in Iceland? Also: Land Rover's Bowler Defender and Volvo's 6-wheeler, the Laplander.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: We spent a day in snowy Austria with rally professional Niki Schelle in a Suzuki SX4 S-Cross. Also: why is the Mitsubishi Lancer Evolution perfect for drifting? And: Mercedes and Chrysler present their all-wheel concept cars.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: We show how to have a lot of fun on gravel roads in a Subaru WRX STI. Also: in the 1990s, Ford had a successful go at rally competitions with the Ford Escort RS Cosworth. And: the Volkswagen Polo WRC shows its 4x4 skills.

programme.title: Arabella Classics
programme.desc: Rare Automobiles and stunning views! The Arabella Classics, one of the most exclusive Classic Car Rallies in Europe.

programme.title: Porsche Ruf RT35
programme.desc: Ruf RT35 may look like a Porsche, but it really isn't. Since 1981, the Ruf company in Pfaffhausen, Germany, has been recognized as an independent manufacturer. But the basis for its vehicles comes exclusively from Porsche. A Ruf is even faster and more exclusive than a comparable Porsche.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: The Bentley New Flying Spur and the Rolls Royce Wraith are both an extremely exclusive breed of cars. These luxurious power packs make for an almost transcendental driving experience and deliver the perfect combination of elegance and performance.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: There are names that sound like music in car enthusiasts' ears: the Mc Laren MP4 12C, the Porsche 911 Turbo S and the Mercedes SLS AMG GT are super sports cars that are second to none. We put the pedal to the metal in these exciting and powerful driving machines.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: 1,000 kilometers on the famous Nurburgring. It's the final race of the 2013 season. The Blancpain Endurance Series is a racing event for grand tourers like the Ferrari 458 Italia, the McLaren MP4-12 C or the Nissan GT-R Nismo GT3. We took a look at all the action, the drivers, their cars and the competition.

programme.title: Mercedes 300 SL Lightweight
programme.desc: An iconic racing car and one of only 29 ever built! We accompanied the Mercedes 300 SL 'lightweight' on its premiere drive at the Mille Miglia.

programme.title: Bentley Bentayga
programme.desc: With the Bentley Bentayga, the traditional British brand is entering the fastest growing market segment. This world's first luxury SUV is a conglomerate of superlatives on wheels.

programme.title: Offroad & Fun, Part 25
programme.desc: Experience the blazing speed and heart-stopping stunts of Rally and Motocross.

programme.title: Racetrack 2024, Part 10
programme.desc: Get ready for an adrenaline-fueled ride as Racetrack brings you all the highlights from this year's European Truck Racing Championship.

programme.title: Racetrack 2024, Part 10
programme.desc: Get ready for an adrenaline-fueled ride as Racetrack brings you all the highlights from this year's European Truck Racing Championship.
